item.title: The TRUE Face of Islam and Decolonization [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ October 17, 2023
In this episode, hosts Matthew Hallick and Andrew DeBartolo discuss the recent terrorist (yeah, we said it) attacks by Hamas on innocent Israeli citizens and the religious ground-motive that explains such unbelievable evil. 

[Segment 1] - The Attack and the People's Response:
"ABC News Live Updates on Israel-Gaza-Hamas Conflict" | ABC News: https://abcnews.go.com/International/live-updates/israel-gaza-hamas/?id=103804516;
"They Butchered Us: Israelis Speak Following Deadly Hamas Attacks" | The Daily Wire: https://www.dailywire.com/news/they-butchered-us-israelis-speak-following-deadly-hamas-attacks;
"The Face of Absolute Evil" | Ben Shapiro: https://www.youtube.com/embed/U-b5ZOEcLOM;

[Segment 2] - The Media and Our Elected Officials Respond:
"CBC Leaked Emails Tell Reporters Not to Use 'Terrorist' for Hamas Coverage (Opinion, Not Fact)" | Fox News: https://www.foxnews.com/media/cbc-leaked-emails-tell-reporters-not-use-terrorist-hamas-coverage-opinion-not-fact;
"Joly Says, 'I am a Busy Woman' Over Canada's Slow Response to Israel Conflict" | Western Standard News: https://www.westernstandard.news/news/joly-says-i-am-a-busy-woman-over-canada-s-slow-response-to-israel-conflict/article_4572a084-68fc-11ee-9b80-b7ad78a3e556.html;
"Twitter Post by Brian Lilley" | Twitter: https://twitter.com/brianlilley/status/1711934585217355950;
"Trudeau's Inclusion Advisor Silent on Hamas Terrorist Attacks" | Western Standard News: https://www.westernstandard.news/news/trudeau-s-inclusion-advisor-silent-on-hamas-terrorist-attacks/article_755ec2f2-6c33-11ee-a8da-b74e873741b2.html;
"Ontario Labour Minister Refuses to Meet CUPE Leader Over Hamas Support" | Western Standard News: https://www.westernstandard.news/news/ontario-labour-minister-refuses-to-meet-cupe-leader-over-hamas-support/article_3f95c5b8-69df-11ee-a621-cb408c6e4181.html;
Tweet by Christopher F. Rufo: https://twitter.com/realchrisrufo/status/1711468581723000840;

[Segment 3] -Real Islam and Why We Can't Partner with Them:
Nabeel Qureshi: "Why I stopped believing Islam is a religion of peace" | Premier Christian Radio: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2htOWOF4gqs;
Seeking Allah, Finding Jesus by Nabeel Qureshi: https://www.amazon.ca/Seeking-Allah-Finding-Jesus-Christianity/dp/0310527236;

MUST WATCH: Muslims BLAST Jordan Peterson for Supporting Israel Against Hamas | Acts 17 Apologetics ft. David Wood, Robert Spencer, and the Apostate Prophet (AP): https://apologetics315.com/videos/acts-17-apologetics/?wchannelid=7gugggjeoo&wmediaid=udbbfnjiie;

MUST READ: What Every Christian Needs to Know About the Qur'an | James R. White: https://www.amazon.ca/Every-Christian-Needs-About-Quran/dp/0764209760/ref=sr_1_1?crid=ASYF7A804TAB&keywords=what+every+christians+needs+to+know+about+islam&qid=1697579362&s=books&sprefix=what+e+very+chrsitians+needs+to+know+about+islam%2Cstripbooks%2C84&sr=1-1

item.title: A WIKI'd ATTACK!!! [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ October 12, 2023
In this episode, host Andrew DeBartolo debunks the silly Leftist boogeyman of Christian Nationalism used to attack LCC over and over again. 

[Segment 1] - The Christian Nationalism Boogieman:
"Christian Nationalism" | Wikipedia: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Christian_nationalism;
"Religious Nationalism" | Wikipedia: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Religious_nationalism;
"Theocracy" | Wikipedia: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Theocracy;

[Segment 2] - LCC, COVID, and Lockdowns:
"COVID-19 conspiracy theories are spreading online like a virus: An inside look at a" | The Star: https://www.thestar.com/news/investigations/covid-19-conspiracy-theories-are-spreading-online-like-a-virus-an-inside-look-at-a/article_466651b9-0471-56af-abb8-96b9b7349427.html;
"End the Lockdown Caucus" | Liberty Coalition Canada: https://libertycoalitioncanada.com/end-the-lockdown-caucus;
"FAQ" | Niagara Declaration: https://www.niagaradeclaration.ca/faq;

[Segment 3] - LCC and the Alt-Right:
"Excommunicated politicians partner with Christian nationalists in COVID conspiracy movement" | AntiHate.ca: https://www.antihate.ca/excommunicated_politicians_partner_with_christian_nationalists_in_covid_conspiracy_movement;
"Canada First exposed: Tyler Russell" | AntiHate.ca: https://www.antihate.ca/canada_first_exposed_tyler_russell;

item.title: Canada's Day of LIES & SEPARATION [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ October 05, 2023
In this episode, hosts Andrew and Matthew reflect on the National Day for Truth & Reconciliation, better called the Day of Lies & Separation. The guys also how Woke Ideology kills and destroys and how even the Pope is not immune.

[Segment 1] - Canada's Day of Lies and Separation:
"National Day for Truth and Reconciliation" | Canada.ca: https://www.canada.ca/en/canadian-heritage/campaigns/national-day-truth-reconciliation.html;
"Dig at Canada Mass Burial Sites Finds No Bodies Despite Trudeau Media Firestorm: Report" | Fox News: https://www.foxnews.com/world/dig-at-canada-mass-burial-sites-finds-no-bodies-despite-trudeau-media-firestorm-report;
"Every Child Matters... Every. One." | The Great Exchange Podcast: https://static1.squarespace.com/static/60b19d6018ba745a54c6edfa/t/60f88d74ab987d687e64ac88/1626902038579/TGE387.mp3/original/TGE387.mp3?download=true; 

MUST WATCH: "The Truth About Residential Schools with Brian Dale Giesbrecht" | Open Mike with Michael Thiessen: https://rumble.com/v19ph0x-the-truth-about-residential-schools-wbrian-dale-giesbrecht.html.

[Segment 2] - DEEP DISCIPLESHIP FOR DARK DAYS ft. Pastor Paul Dirks:
"Pope Francis to Clergy: Decide for Yourself Whether to Bless Homosexual Unions" | LifeSiteNews: https://www.lifesitenews.com/news/pope-francis-to-clergy-decide-for-yourself-whether-to-bless-homosexual-unions;
"Hélder Câmara" | Wikipedia: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/H%C3%A9lder_C%C3%A2mara;
"Pact of the Catacombs" | Wikipedia: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pact_of_the_Catacombs;
"Transgender Minors in Canada" | TNC News: https://tnc.news/2023/09/30/ransgender-minors-canada;
"Transgender Top Surgery for Canadian Children" | National Post: https://nationalpost.com/news/canada/transgender-top-surgery-canadian-children;
"Love Thy Body: Answering Hard Questions about Life and Sexuality" | Amazon.ca: https://www.amazon.ca/Love-Thy-Body-Answering-Questions/dp/0801075726;
"Exile: The Restoration of Femininity" | Amazon.ca: https://www.amazon.ca/Exile-Restoration-Femininity-Rebekah-Merkle/dp/1944503528

item.title: CRTC CENSORS ARE COMING FOR YOUR CONTENT!!! [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ October 03, 2023
In this episode, hosts Andrew and Matthew look at the dystopian fallout of the CRTC's new regulatory powers since the passing of Bill C-11. While the Trudeau Regime thinks they are "modernizing" content regulation, in reality, they are tyrannizing it. Also, the guys look at continued insanity surrounding COVID and the Marxist Rainbow Guard. 

[Segment 1] - CRTC requires online streaming services to register:

"CRTC Takes Major Step Forward to Modernize Canada's Broadcasting Framework" | Canada.ca: https://www.canada.ca/en/radio-television-telecommunications/news/2023/09/crtc-takes-major-step-forward-to-modernize-canadas-broadcasting-framework.html;
"Registration for the Modernization of the Telecommunications Act" | CRTC: https://crtc.gc.ca/eng/industr/modern/registr.htm;

[Segment 2] - COVID craziness just won't die:
"B.C. to Extend Mask Mandate in Health Care Settings" | Global News: https://globalnews.ca/news/9990387/bc-mask-mandate-health-care-settings-2023;
"Suspension Letters Issued to More Than 1,600 Simcoe Muskoka Students With Outdated Immunization Records" | CTV News: https://barrie.ctvnews.ca/suspension-letters-issued-to-more-than-1-600-simcoe-muskoka-students-with-outdated-immunization-records-1.6578249;

[Segment 3] - Waterloo is a Woke wasteland:
"Waterloo Man Harassed Bylaw Officers Over Property" | TNC News: https://tnc.news/2023/09/25/waterloo-harassed-bylaw;
"Levy: Waterloo School Board Director" | TNC News: https://tnc.news/2023/10/02/levy-waterloo-school-board-director;
"We All Play a Role in Supporting Human Rights in Waterloo Region" | WRDSB: https://www.wrdsb.ca/blog/2023/09/28/we-all-play-a-role-in-supporting-human-rights-in-waterloo-region;
"Menstrual Health Day" | WRDSB: https://www.wrdsb.ca/blog/2022/05/28/menstrual-health-day.
